creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: circular breast plate adornment; center has a rather large sphere; sphere is surrounded by three panels; one panel has a peacock-like bird; second has a rooster fighting with another animal; third has a butterfly or moth; panels have dot background; two rings of T-shaped fringe run around the outside; breast plate also has large pin-like portion on the back
title: Breast plate adornment
